Bitstamp Earn Lending: September 2024 Performance Report
Check out the latest Bitstamp Lending Report for a clear breakdown of market trends, portfolio performance, and borrower insights from September 2024.

Our September Lending Performance Report is ready, and we’ve packed it with everything you need to stay informed. It’s all about giving you a straightforward view of how our lending product performed last month.

Partnering with Tesseract, we’ve compiled the data that matters. Whether you're actively involved in lending or just keeping an eye on the market, this report gives you a clear snapshot of what’s been happening.

What you’ll find in the report

  • Market overview: A snapshot of the factors influencing crypto prices and movements in September.
  • Portfolio insights: Get the lowdown on how our lending portfolio performed, from loan activity to asset growth and distribution.
  • Risk management: See how we manage risk and protect assets through effective collateral measures.
  • Borrower metrics: An analysis of borrower leverage, giving you a clear picture of their financial health and what it means for future lending.

At Bitstamp, we focus on transparency. We believe in keeping you updated with reports that give you clear facts, helping you make better lending decisions.

Download the September 2024 Lending Performance Report now

* The availability of Bitstamp Earn Lending depends on many considerations, including the entity to which you are onboarded and the jurisdiction where you reside. Lending is not available in the US, UK, and Singapore.
